Title: Five Cycles at Pebbles
Description:
[b]Can you survive?[/b]

[hr]

[h1]FIVE CYCLES AT PEBBLES[/h1]

A Five Nights At Freddy's-inspired gamemode! Play as The Nightguard, a purposed soul trapped in an abandoned benefactor's pizzeria by your manager, Five Pebbles, relentlessly hunted down by evil slugcat animatronics!

Features basic translations for all languages that Rain World supports! [i](WARNING: may be inaccurate; they were done via online translator, some are refined by humans. Let me know if you would like to help with proofreading the translations!)[/i]

[h2]CONTROLS[/h2]

[h3]In-Camera:[/h3]
[list]
[*][b]MOVEMENT[/b] to navigate between cameras
[*][b]JUMP[/b] to select the camera
[*][b]GRAB[/b] to exit the camera
[/list]

[h3]Out of Camera:[/h3]
[list]
[*]If standing near the edges of the room, [b]GRAB[/b] to turn on light and [b]THROW[/b] to toggle door
[*]If standing in the middle, [b]GRAB[/b] to open cameras and [b]THROW[/b] to tell Five Pebbles to shut up.
[/list]

[h2]INCOMPATIBILITIES[/h2]
[list]
[*](fixed) [b][u]Properties Expanded[/u][/b]: due to a mistyped property for Inv's campaign, because FCAP uses Inv worldstate (for the funnies). Crashes on attempting to enter the campaign. Properties Expanded has since fixed this issue, but it may not be updated. The way to force it to update is to unsubscribe and resubscribe to it.
[*][b][u]Apex Up Your Spawns[/u][/b]: due to being unable to path to the offscreen den, I guess? Either way, not something I can really fix. Crashes on attempting to enter the campaign.
[/list]
